title: SEC Chair Advocates Increased AI Use for Market Surveillance and Enforcement
description: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Chairman Gary Gensler says the SEC could benefit from making greater use of artificial intelligence (AI) in several areas, including enforcement and market surveillance. However, he also raised a number of concerns associated with AI, emphasizing that the regulator is currently developing rules to address AI-related challenges. Gary Gensler on […]

title: Valkyrie’s spot Bitcoin ETF proposal is now on SEC’s Nasdaq rulemaking list
description: Valkyrie’s Bitcoin exchange-traded fund proposal has been accepted by the SEC for official review. The proposal entered the official docket on July 17, as per data from the SEC’s Nasdaq rulemaking list. Last in the batch Following the recent publication…
